text: [circus music]
[laughs]
Lights out, folks.

Hey, nobody steals Coney
Island's glow on my watch.

Allow me to introduce
the sun blaster.
[laser fires]
Sun blaster for Moon Girl?
Ever hear a brand confusion?
[laughs]

- We got to change that name.
- I know.

But one direct hit from
this blaster and we

can flip the switch
on our powers.

Come on, D.
- You do that.
I'll workshop the name.

(SINGING) Shine the
light, win the fight
Shine the light, win the fight
Light is a form of energy
A special kind that we can see

And all living things
need light to live

It keeps us warm with
the heat it gives

And Nox can try her
best to do her worst

But light is the fastest
thing in the universe

So let's try again
for the final blow

I'll refract a white
light so you see a rainbow
[grunts]
Wait, reflection.
That's it!

(SINGING) Now light likes
to travel in a straight line

But it's known to bounce off
surfaces from time to time
That's called reflection

So let's target Nox
from every direction

Yoo-hoo, Nox,
come and find me.
Ugh.
Shoot your shot.

I can easily dodge
your beams of light.
Are you sure about that?

(SINGING) Shine the
light, win the fight
[lasers firing]
No!
[dance music]
I got it, Casey.

Solar radiation, replication,
and refraction device.
Or the sun blaster.
Genius, right?
Hmm.
